gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.candidate

Class DefaultCandidateFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.candidate.DefaultCandidateFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CandidateFilter

    public class DefaultCandidateFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements CandidateFilter
    The default candidate filtering method. It consists of applying the following filtering methods sequentially:
    • SemanticClassFilter with Entity, Expression, Relation, and Conjunction semantic classes.
    • NounPhraseFilter
    • VerbPhraseFilter
    The candidates that pass the SemanticClassFilter and NounPhraseFilter filters are kept, those that pass VerbPhraseFilter are eliminated. This filter is not appropriate for event anaphora, since they can be indicated by verbal phrases.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu
